name: Mini Trooper Shooter Pro
description:
Welcome to the unique mini tropper shooter game. Enjoy the Latest version of gun 3D with fantastic environments, realistic effective sound and stunning Graphics, you have to kill the zombies in the dark city zone and clear the terror block strike houses and dispatch deadly hell zombies. In Tropper Shooter you have to be careful about the zombie enemy. In this Zombie Killing game you have a limited time to shoot the dead man in late zone. Zombie Hunting and start killing zombies in this game and enjoy it with more amusement in game.
Aim at the zombies and take head shots to saves your block y soldier. Select deadly weapons and map to fine the smasher death zombies. Shoot the zombies in thrilling environments with horror sound.
